content.question: Which of the following claims did Hamilton make in the excerpt about the powers of the United States under the Articles of Confederation?

choices.label: The United States could not engage in diplomacy with foreign countries.
The United States was not empowered to raise sufficient money for the government.
The United States could act without the unanimous consent of the states.
The United States was able to raise military forces sufficient to defend the country.

content.answer: The United States was not empowered to raise sufficient money for the government.

topic.text: 3.8: The Constitutional Convention and Debates over Ratification

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
